title: 88/68/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1987 making an initial allocation to Denmark of part of the resources to be charged to the 1988 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks to designated organizations for distribution to the most deprived persons in the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 December 1987
making an initial allocation to Denmark of part of the resources to be charged to the 1988 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks to designated organizations for distribution to the most deprived persons in the Community
(88/68/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. An initial partial allocation of the resources referred to in Article 10 of Regulation No 3744/87 shall be made as follows:
- Denmark: 100 000 ECU.
2. Subject to the limit set out in paragraph 1, the following quantities of produce may be withdrawn, from intervention, for distribution in Denmark:
- up to five tonnes of butter,
- up to 20 tonnes of beef.
3. The withdrawals referred to in paragraph 2 may be made from 21 December 1987.
Further decisions shall be taken relating to the allocation of resources for all Member States, including the granting of additional resources to Denmark, once the requirements are known.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
